com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.builder

Interface LoaderChannelBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.github.dm.jrt.core.config.ChannelConfigurable<LoaderChannelBuilder>, com.github.dm.jrt.core.config.ChannelConfiguration.Configurable<LoaderChannelBuilder>, LoaderConfigurable<LoaderChannelBuilder>, LoaderConfiguration.Configurable<LoaderChannelBuilder>

    public interface LoaderChannelBuilder
extends com.github.dm.jrt.core.config.ChannelConfigurable<LoaderChannelBuilder>, LoaderConfigurable<LoaderChannelBuilder>
    Interface defining a builder of channels bound to Loader invocations.
    In order to be successfully bound, the specific routine invocation must have a user defined ID and still be running (or cached) at the time of the channel creation.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 01/14/2015.

    See Also:
    LoaderRoutineBuilder

      • applyLoaderConfiguration

        @NotNull
LoaderConfiguration.Builder<? extends LoaderChannelBuilder> applyLoaderConfiguration()
        Gets the Loader configuration builder related to the instance.
        The configuration options not supported by the specific implementation might be ignored.

        Note that the configuration builder must be initialized with the current configuration.

        The clash resolution types will be ignored.

        Specified by:
        applyLoaderConfiguration in interface LoaderConfigurable<LoaderChannelBuilder>
        Returns:
        the Loader configuration builder.

      • buildChannel

        @NotNull
<OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.core.channel.Channel<?,OUT> buildChannel()
        Builds and returns a channel bound to the routine invocation.
        Type Parameters:
        OUT - the output data type.
        Returns:
        the newly created channel.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the configured Loader ID is equal to AUTO.
